Comprehensive Technology Services

Strategic consulting and hands-on implementation to transform your technology landscape and drive measurable business outcomes.

Tech-to-Value Architecture

Strategic technology planning that directly connects technical decisions to measurable business outcomes and ROI.

Key Capabilities

  • Technology roadmapping aligned with business goals
  • ROI analysis and value stream mapping
  • Architecture decision records (ADRs)
  • Technical debt assessment and prioritization
  • Technology stack evaluation and selection

Solution Architecture

Enterprise-grade system design combining scalability, security, and performance for mission-critical applications.

Key Capabilities

  • Microservices and event-driven architecture
  • API design and integration patterns
  • Security architecture and compliance
  • Performance optimization strategies
  • High-availability and disaster recovery planning

Agentic AI System Design

Multi-agent AI systems using LangChain, LangGraph, and CrewAI for intelligent automation and decision-making.

Key Capabilities

  • LangChain and LangGraph implementation
  • Multi-agent orchestration with CrewAI
  • Custom AI agent development
  • RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems
  • LLM integration and fine-tuning strategies

Open Source Integration

Leverage powerful open-source technologies to reduce costs while maintaining enterprise-level capabilities.

Key Capabilities

  • Open source technology evaluation
  • License compliance and risk assessment
  • Community engagement strategies
  • Custom extension development
  • Support and maintenance planning

Backend Architecture & DevOps

Modern infrastructure with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms for reliable operations.

Key Capabilities

  • Node.js, Python, and FastAPI development
  • Docker containerization and orchestration
  • Kubernetes deployment and management
  • AWS, GCP, and Azure cloud infrastructure
  • CI/CD pipeline automation

Technology Evangelism & Education

Education and training programs to upskill your team and create a culture of innovation.

Key Capabilities

  • Technical workshops and training
  • Hands-on coding bootcamps
  • Architecture review sessions
  • Best practices documentation
  • Technology adoption programs

HU-CZ Business Services

Strategic partnerships and business facilitation between Hungary and Czech Republic markets.

Key Capabilities

  • Market entry strategy consulting
  • Business partnership facilitation
  • Regulatory compliance guidance
  • Cultural and business practice advisory
  • Network building and introductions
